about.title: About me
about.text: I am a passionate frontend and web developer focused on modern, performant and user-friendly web applications.

facts.location: Kufstein, Tyrol – open to remote work
facts.mindset: Curious, open to new technologies and continuous improvement
facts.approach: Analytical, solution-oriented and detail-focused – with emphasis on quality, performance and UX

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.p1: I work with modern frontend technologies and focus on clean structure, performance, and user-friendly UI/UX.
skills.p2: I see new tools not as a hurdle but as a chance — I keep learning and adapt quickly.

cta.title: You need another
cta.text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding my knowledge.

growth.hint: I have a special interest in learning

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here — interact with projects to see my skills in action.

items.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag & drop, assign users and categories.
items.pollo: Jump-and-run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa.
items.pokedex: Interactive Pokédex app built with the public Pokémon API. Browse, search and explore with dynamic loading, clean UI and responsive design.

references.title: What my colleagues say about me

items.0: Milos has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.
items.1: I had the good fortune of working with Milos in a group project. He stayed calm, focused, and made sure our team was set up for success.
items.2: Strong communication, clean implementation, and a great sense for UI/UX details. I’d happily work with him again.
items.3: Very structured and reliable. Milos helped keep the project on track and supported the team whenever needed.
items.4: Great technical understanding and fast execution. Milos delivers clean code and communicates clearly.
